src:
Inilah Harapan Besar Aries Susanti Rahayu Jelang Olimpiade Tokyo 2020
01 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juara dunia panjat tebing asal Indonesia, Aries Susanti Rahayu, mengaku punya harapan besar menghadapi Olimpiade 2020 di Tokyo, Jepang. Aries menyatakan akan mengerahkan seluruh kemampuannya demi lolos kualifikasi dan berprestasi di Olimpiade.
Panjat tebing untuk kali pertama akan dipertandingkan di Olimpiade pada tahun depan di Jepang. Kelas yang dipertandingkan di Olimpiade 2020 adalah women combined dan man combined.
Artinya, setiap atlet harus bertanding di nomor speed, lead, dan boulder sekaligus. Para atlet panjat tebing dari penjuru dunia akan mengikuti kualifikasi Olimpiade terlebih dulu di Paris, Prancis, pada akhir November 2019.
text:
This is Aries Susanti Rahayu's Great Hope Ahead of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics
Nov 01 2019, 08:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian rock climbing world champion, Aries Susanti Rahayu, claimed to have great hopes facing the 2020 Olympics in Tokyo, Japan. Aries said he would use all of his abilities to qualify and achieve in the Olympics.
Rock climbing for the first time will be competed at the Olympics next year in Japan. The classes competed at the 2020 Olympics are women combined and man combined.
That is, each athlete must compete in speed, lead and boulder numbers at the same time. Rock climbing athletes from around the world will take part in the Olympic qualifications first in Paris, France, at the end of November 2019.
